paper_abstract: This paper is concerned with the existence and exponential stability of positive almost periodic solutions of shunting inhibitory cellular neural networks (SICNNs) with time-varying delays arising from the description of the states of neurons in delayed neural networks in a time-varying situation. By applying Lyapunov functional method and differential inequality techniques, new sufficient conditions ensuring the existence and exponential stability of positive almost periodic solutions for SICNNs are established. paper_title: Positive almost periodic solutions for shunting inhibitory cellular neural networks with time-varying delays
